TextLibrary.Text: You don't need to battle the Sea Serpent as Drong is not here to try any sandstone. You should return with him.
You have failed to defeat the Sea Serpent. You will need to beat it before Drong can have any tasty sandstone.
Drong rewards you for finding him some delicious sandstone.
You must journey to the beach at Tirianin to find sandstone for Drong.
